text: Henri Marescaux (12 September 1943 – 1 April 2021) was a French army general and Roman Catholic deacon. In 2004, Marescaux was ordained a deacon with the Diocese of Versailles by Bishop Éric Aumonier. He founded the Association Tamaris for the prostitutes' aide. In 2019, he published a book on his experiences, titled Les prostituées nous précèdent. Marescaux died in Le Chesnay on 1 April 2021 at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French generals Category:Writers from Auvergne- Rhône-Alpes Category:French Roman Catholics Category:People from Savoie
title: Henri Marescaux
